more_decls.doc_comment: Atomically modifies memory and then returns the previous value.
more_decls.pl: fn xchg(self: *Self, operand: bool, comptime ordering: std.builtin.AtomicOrder) bool
fn load(self: *Self, comptime ordering: std.builtin.AtomicOrder) bool
fn store(self: *Self, value: bool, comptime ordering: std.builtin.AtomicOrder) void
